text: HR 5171 is a yellow hypergiant star, and the largest of its type. Its size is over 1,300 (or 1,500) times larger and 630,000 times brighter than the Sun. It is orbited by a smaller yellow hypergiant and a blue star. File:Artistâ€™s impression of the yellow hypergiant star HR 5171.jpg|Possible impression.
